item.title: Gradle in Tight Security Environments
item.description: In tightly controlled, secured environments *cough, corporate, cough*, using Gradle requires a little bit more setup. The following works if the environment has an artifact repository such as Artifactory in place. In settings.gradle.kts, configure pluginManagement as follows: pluginManagement { repositories { maven { url = uri("https://path.to/corporate/artifact/repository") credentials { username = "approved-corporate-userid-to-access-repository" password = "password-of-the-approved-corporate-userid" } } } The snippet above assumes the corporate artifact repository uses Maven layout in organizing the artifacts.
